Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to the penalty upon architects relating to illegal conversion of dwellings
Summary: Requires license revocation for architects for the preparation of plans or drawings for structures which violate provisions of state or local laws regarding the illegal conversion of dwellings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the penalty imposed upon architects relating to illegal conversion of dwellings
